question: Analyze the impact of social media presence on company growth in 2022.

subtasks.task: Identify the companies with available social media engagement data for the year 2022.
Gather financial metrics (revenue, net income, market capitalization) for the selected companies for the year 2022.
Analyze the correlation between social media engagement metrics and financial growth indicators of the companies for 2022.
Summarize findings and trends observed from the analysis to present a report on the impact of social media on company growth.
